decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design and access statement, Location plan, R/1407/PL/01, R/1407/PL/05 received on 15/01/2015 and R/1407/PL/02 Rev A, R/1407/PL/03 Rev A and R/1407/PL/04 Rev A received on 10/03/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The windows formed in the north eastern and south western elevations shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  north eastern and south western walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Retrospective application for the erection of a  two storey side extension, part single, part three storey rear extension, a front porch and rear roof extensions with 2 roof windows to the front elevation
